questions.Q1: What are the key sustainability focus areas mentioned in the document?
questions.Q2: List all the subtacks/sub-missions/sub-focus mentioned under each focus area along with the target figures, budget allocated and timelines mentioned for these, if any.
questions.Q3: What are the best practices or lessons learnt mentioned for the tasks, if any.

postfix.Q1: return a list of focus areas mentioned in the document in json format.
postfix.Q2: for each focus area, return a list of subtacks mentioned along with the target figures, budget allocated and timelines mentioned for these in json format, if any.
